text: Óscar José Rafael Berger Perdomo (born 11 August 1946 in Guatemala City) is a Guatemalan politician. He served as President of Guatemala serving from 2004 through 2008.Óscar Berger Perdomo , Centro De Estudios Internacionales De Barcelona. title: Óscar Berger
